name: Paper Brawl
description:
A tower defense like no other! 

Fight waves of emblematic enemies in a handcrafted cardboard world!

Build structures, strategically set up bites, expand your borders, ... to ensure your survival defending from all kind of enemies: ranged, healers, intelligent, ...

Every game is different thanks to the procedurally generated environments.

Enemies will continuously spawn around the island's coast. They will try to destroy your base, so you must protect! Build structures taking advantage of the terrain, place traps, adapt to the strategies of the enemy, ...

Controls:

Camera Movement: WASD
Camera Rotation: Q and R
Sprint / Fast movement: L Shift
Building selection and placement: LMB
Cancel/Back: RMB
